edu.wisc.trace.uch

Class UchContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wisc.trace.uch.UchContextListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ServletContextListener

    public class UchContextListener
extends Object
implements ServletContextListener
    Does the initialization when the UCH Context is initialized in WebServer and performs necessary tasks when Context is destroyed.
    Version:
    $Revision: 798 $
    Author:
    Parikshit Thakur & Team, Trace R&D Center

      • contextInitialized

        public void contextInitialized(ServletContextEvent servletContextEvent)
        Provide the initialization when the Context is initialized. Set appropriate debug level. Instantiate an object UCH and set it as an attributes of ServletContext.
